#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>
#include <math.h>

#define SIZE 1000001

using namespace std;

typedef long long int Lint;

int main() {
	
	Lint t, i, j, n, val;
	vector<bool> A( SIZE, true );		
	
	A[ 0 ] = A[ 1 ] = false;
	
	for( i = 2;( i * i ) <= SIZE;i++ )
		for( j = ( i * i );j <= SIZE;j += i )
			if( A[ j ] )
				A[ j ] = false;
	
	scanf("%lld", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%lld", &n );

		val = (Lint)sqrt( n );

		if( ( ( val * val ) == n ) && A[ val ] )
			printf("YES\n");
		else
			printf("NO\n");			
	}

	return 0;
}
